subject: Language Arts
title: Explain It! The Power of Expository Writing
learningObjectives: Define expository writing and its purpose.
Differentiate between expository writing and other types of writing.
Structure an expository essay with an introduction, body paragraphs, and a conclusion.

content.body: Expository writing is all about explaining or informing. Its main purpose is to present information in a clear and organized way.

content.alt: An icon representing an informational text with a title and paragraphs.

content.body: Unlike narrative writing, which tells a story, or persuasive writing, which tries to convince you of something, expository writing presents facts and evidence to teach the reader about a topic.

questions.question: What is the main purpose of expository writing?
Which of these is an example of expository writing?

es.title: ¡Explícalo! El Poder de la Escritura Expositiva

content.body: La escritura expositiva se trata de explicar o informar. Su propósito principal es presentar información de una manera clara y organizada.

questions.question: ¿Cuál es el propósito principal de la escritura expositiva?
¿Cuál de estos es un ejemplo de escritura expositiva?
options: Un libro de texto de ciencias
